Name: Broodjeszaak Polat
Review Text: Amazing place to eat in cheap price in Amsterdam .The people are loving. Donor with a cup of Turkish tea will give you energy for all day .Once I eat with them and again and again I go to them..

Name: Broodjeszaak Polat
Review Text: Coming over from the UK, I came across this establishment. Wow. Good food, amazing durum doner, friendly Turkish owners. So tasty. Highly recommend.

Name: Broodjeszaak Polat
Review Text: I like their doner. Taste is good and owners are sweet people.

Review Text: Really nice owner, food was really great
